gw.testharness

Class TestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • com.guidewire.testharness.AbstractTest
          • gw.testharness.TestBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.testharness.ITest, ITestWithMetadata, junit.framework.Test
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArchiveTestBase

    public abstract class TestBase
extends com.guidewire.testharness.AbstractTest
    The base class for all tests at Guidewire.

    This class should ONLY contain base assert methods and other helpers that ALL tests need. Please do not pollute this class with other methods that don't pertain to ALL tests. Put the methods on a helper class.

    DO NOT remove final from the methods overriden here or from AbstractTest

                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: com.guidewire.testharness.AbstractTest
        Per-test-class setup method; subclasses should override this method if they need to set up data objects once per test class. The harness will automatically call this method once per test class, no matter how many tests are in that test class.

      • beforeClass

        protected void beforeClass()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Override this method to do something before the tests in the class are invoked. Each test runs in its own instance of the class, so data set up in beforeClass() must set static variables, instance variables will be lost when subsequent methods are invoked.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception

      • afterClass

        protected void afterClass()
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Override this method to do something after all tests in the class have finished.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception
        See Also:
        if initializing variables.

      • getResourcePackageAsIDirectory

        public final IDirectory getResourcePackageAsIDirectory()
        Finds the resource of the current type as an IFile representing this gosu or java type, then returns the parent IDirectory of the found IFile. This will be a physical file in the dev environment, but when running from the distribution build, from Gitmo, or TH, it will in many cases represent a location within a jar file.
        Overrides:
        getResourcePackageAsIDirectory in class com.guidewire.testharness.AbstractTest
        Returns:
        the parent directory of this resource
